Package com.github.skopylov58.retry

Class Retry.Worker<T>

java.lang.Object
com.github.skopylov58.retry.Retry.Worker<T>
Type Parameters:
T - result type
Enclosing interface:
Retry
public static class Retry.Worker<T> extends Object
Retry worker, class that actually performs asynchronous retries.

  • Method Details

    • withExecutor

      public Retry.Worker<T> withExecutor(Executor executor)
      Specifies executor to perform retries.

      Default - ForkJoinPool.commonPool()

      Parameters:
      executor - executor to use for retry.
      Returns:
      this Worker

    • withFixedDelay

      public Retry.Worker<T> withFixedDelay(Duration delay)
      Specifies backoff retry strategy with fixed delay.

      Default - 1 second.

      Parameters:
      delay - delay between tries.
      Returns:
      this Worker

    • withBackoff

      public Retry.Worker<T> withBackoff(Function<Long,Duration> backoff)
      With backoff function you can implement different retry delay strategies - linear, exponential, fibonacci, etc.

      Default - fixed delay 1 second.

      Parameters:
      backoff - function that maps current try number (starting with 0) to delay
      Returns:
      this Worker

    • onError

      public Retry.Worker<T> onError(BiConsumer<Long,Throwable> onError)
      Error listener.

      Default - no error listener.

      Parameters:
      onError - bi consumer with try number and error
      Returns:
      this Worker

    • retryOnException

      public Retry.Worker<T> retryOnException(Predicate<Throwable> pred)
      Specifies which exception(s) to retry. If predicate return true then worker will retry this exception, otherwise complete future exceptionally.

      Default - retry on any Exception.

      Parameters:
      pred - predicate to test.
      Returns:
      this Worker

    • retryOnValue

      public Retry.Worker<T> retryOnValue(Predicate<T> pred)
      Allows retry on some specific return values, like "Service not available", null values, etc.

      Default - no retry on any return value.

      Parameters:
      pred - predicate to test return values. if predicate returns true then worker will retry operation.
      Returns:
      this Worker

    • retry

      public CompletableFuture<T> retry()
      Starts retry forever operation.
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture

    • retry

      public CompletableFuture<T> retry(long maxRetries)
      Retry with maximum number of tries
      Parameters:
      maxRetries - maximum number of tries
      Returns:
      CompletableFuture
